desc.p: CHILD.LC.NO is the field which consists of the child lc's number.It is the valid LC contract number which is the child ie) a LC contract's id whose PARENT.LC.NUMBER field has some valid LC number.

LC.TRANSFERABLE is a concat file updated while inputting transferable LCs.The id is the LC contract number which is the parent LC.Id is same as the LC contract number.It is the LC number which is inputted as PARENT.LC.NUMBER while inputting chile LC.
